extendedInfo.description: Find movies & showtimes for nearby Regal Cinemas, Edwards and United Artists theatres, and purchase tickets on-the-go with the official Regal Cinemas app. Download this FREE app and enjoy the following features:Find theatre locations near you - Use GPS to find theatres nearest you- Search theatres by zip code- Click-to-call theatres- Get directions with Google maps- Purchase ticketsBrowse movies and showtimes- Find movies showing near you and coming soon- Watch trailers & scroll photo galleries- Review movie synopsis, cast, ratings and runtimes- Purchase ticketsIn the Theatre- Regal is now integrated with the new FirstLook Sync App, the only true second screen for the big screen-Turn on FirstLook sync in the auditorium before the movie and get enhanced content, valuable offers and games synced right to your phone.My Account- Scan and store your Regal Crown Club card on the Regal for hassle-free use- Save your credit card number for quick and easy check-out - Check RCC credit balance- View upcoming orders and purchase historyExtras- Receive personalized notifications from participating Regal, Edwards and United Artists theatres- Share purchases via Facebook and Twitter- Send upcoming showtimes to friends via text and email- Set-up calendar reminders for upcoming shows- Enjoy mobile ticketing where available- Select your seats for theatres with reserved seatingBy downloading, installing and using this App, you agree to Regal Cinemas Mobile Application Privacy Policy and Terms of Use as well as Fandangoâs Privacy Policy, Terms of Use, and Purchase Policy.Regal Cinemas Mobile Application Privacy Policy: http://www.regmovies.com/mobileapplicationprivacypolicy.aspxRegal Cinemas Terms of Use: http://www.regmovies.com/mobileapplicationtermsofuse.aspxFandango Privacy Policy: http://mobile.fandango.com/privacypolicyFandango Terms of Use:  http://mobile.fandango.com/termsofuseFandango Purchase Policy: http://mobile.fandango.com/purchasepolicy

reviews.title: Fix the app!
reviews.comment: Glitchy and constantly pops up a crash notice.

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: If possible, I want u guys to add the \"movies have seen\"  feature.  I like to look back and see which movie I have seen in the past.  Please add this feature, please.  Thank you

reviews.title: This Sucks!
reviews.comment: Your app was Great and a 5 Star App! Then you updated it... Now it work 10% of the time and Stops constantly! If you want to fix it, go back to the previous version!

reviews.comment: 5 star awesome apps.

reviews.title: constant crashes
reviews.comment: downloaded this morning and have had three force closures in five minutes.  worst app i\'ve ever used.  uninstalling now.
